mapper.select: select parent.os , parent.version , max(case when parent.env = 'dev' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'dev_path' , max(case when parent.env = 'dev' then parent.origin_file_name ELSE '' end) 'dev_origin_file_name' , max(case when parent.env = 'preprd' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'preprd_path' , max(case when parent.env = 'preprd' then parent.origin_file_name ELSE '' end) 'preprd_origin_file_name' , max(case when parent.env = 'prd' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'prd_path' , max(case when parent.env = 'prd' then parent.origin_file_name ELSE '' end) 'prd_origin_file_name' from( select a.id , b.content_id , a.os , a.version , b.file_name , b.origin_file_name , a.env , RANK() OVER (PARTITION by a.version, a.os, a.env ORDER BY a.mdfy_date desc) as rm from app_mykt a join file_upload b on a.id = b.content_id where b.download_yn = 'Y' ) parent where parent.rm = 1 group by version, os order by version desc, os desc limit 10;
